column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A very drunk Chinese man in a RAV4 hit a luxury Hyundai at high speeds at 2:20 am on May 18
column4: 2019 near Rainbow Bridge in Sangkat Tonle Bassac
column5: Chamkarmon.------Witnesses said that before the incident the RAV4
column6: with a Chinese man in a state of extreme drunkenness drove straight into the other vehicle. After the incident
column7: the parties managed to negotiate a settlement to the victim to end the case.
